cleric.name: Cleric
cleric.description: Clerics rely on holy magic to support their allies and defeat their foes.

monk.name: Monk
monk.description: Monks typically choose to forgoe any and all martial weapons in favor of raw power.

bard.name: Bard
bard.description: Bards can help out their friends with inspiring songs.

warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.description: Warriors are trained in all things combat including protecting their friends.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.description: Rogues are expert thiefs and masters of stealth.

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.description: Rangers are master trailblazers and friends of animals alike.

mage.name: Mage
mage.description: Mages are known for their knowledge of all things spells and magic.

tinker.name: Tinker
tinker.description: Tinkers rely on traps, machines and black powder firearms.

enchanter.name: Enchanter
enchanter.description: Enchanters are trained in alchemy and magical crafting.

mesmer.name: Mesmer
mesmer.description: Mesmers are masters of illusion and trickery.
